questions.question: I saw him ................................ the money.
questions.description: The infinitive is used without to after see.

questions.question: Yesterday I .............................. a new phone as my old one .................................. stolen.
questions.description: We use the past perfect for the earlier of two past actions.

questions.question: They ..................................... a house in Delhi two months ago.
Ever since I .................................... my home, I ...................................... living here.
questions.description: The present perfect continuous is used to talk about actions or situations that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: She usually .................................. white clothes.
questions.description: The simple present is used to talk about habits.

questions.question: I heard her ………………………………… in the next room.
questions.description: The infinitive is used without to after hear.

questions.question: It’s time you …………………………………. that coat.
questions.description: We use a past tense after it’s time to refer to the present.

questions.question: He was ………………………………….. in the battle.
questions.description: Wounded is the past tense of wound.
